name: Copper Gear Set
description: This mod adds a complete set of copper tools and armor that offers a balanced alternative to iron equipment. The copper gear provides significantly better durability than iron (lasting 30-60% longer) but with slightly reduced performance - tools mine a bit slower and armor provides less protection. All armor pieces can be right-clicked while held to automatically equip them to the appropriate slot, making it convenient to quickly gear up for adventures where longevity matters more than peak performance.
